actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to require that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs transport the body of any former member of the Armed Forces who dies in an Armed Forces hospital to the place of burial.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to transport the body of any former member of the Armed Forces who dies in an Armed Forces hospital to the place of burial. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 903)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to require that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs transport the body of any former member of the Armed Forces who dies in an Armed Forces hospital to the place of burial.
